sections.paragraph: என்ன, எப்படி, என்னத்தை, இவ்வளவு, என்னத்திற்கு, எங்கே, என்றும், ஏன், எதினால், என்னத்துக்கு - எச்சம்
What? How? Of what kind?, anything, anght, what may

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive particle; properly interrogitive what? (including how?, why? and when?); but also exclamations like what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjugational sneses: - how (long, oft, [-soever]), [no-] thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby (-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.
